Lunges Training.name: Standard Forward Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Step forward and lower your back knee towards the ground.

Lunges Training.name: Reverse Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Step backward into a lunge position to strengthen knee stability.

Lunges Training.name: Walking Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Perform lunges while moving forward continuously.

Lunges Training.name: Jumping Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Explosively jump and switch legs mid-air for a powerful leg workout.

Lunges Training.name: Curtsy Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Step one leg diagonally behind the other for a deeper glute activation.

Lunges Training.name: Side Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Step to the side and lower into a deep lateral lunge.

Lunges Training.name: Split Squat
Lunges Training.description: Remain in a split stance and lower into a lunge without stepping.

Lunges Training.name: Bulgarian Split Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Elevate your rear foot on a surface and perform lunges for added intensity.

Lunges Training.name: Crossover Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Cross one leg over the other in a lunge position for extra glute engagement.

Lunges Training.name: Lunge with Knee Drive
Lunges Training.description: Drive the rear knee up towards the chest after each lunge.

Lunges Training.name: Isometric Lunge Hold
Lunges Training.description: Hold the lunge position at the bottom for an extended period.

Lunges Training.name: Explosive Step-Through Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Step forward into a lunge, then push explosively into the next step.

Lunges Training.name: Pulsing Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Perform small, controlled up-and-down movements at the bottom of a lunge.

Lunges Training.name: Lunge with Rotation
Lunges Training.description: Perform a lunge while twisting your torso to engage the core.

Lunges Training.name: Step-Back Lunge to Knee Drive
Lunges Training.description: Step back into a lunge and drive the knee forward explosively.

Lunges Training.name: Hover Lunge (Shrimp Squat)
Lunges Training.description: Hold one foot behind you and lower into a deep lunge without touching the ground.

Lunges Training.name: Dynamic Skater Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Jump laterally into a lunge and repeat side to side.

Lunges Training.name: Lunge to Single-Leg Balance
Lunges Training.description: Step into a lunge and then balance on one foot before stepping again.

Lunges Training.name: Elevated Front Foot Lunge
Lunges Training.description: Place your front foot on an elevated surface to increase the range of motion.

Lunges Training.name: High Knees
Lunges Training.description: Run in place while bringing your knees to waist level.

Lunges Training.name: Butt Kicks
Lunges Training.description: Run in place while kicking your heels toward your glutes.

Lunges Training.name: Leg Swings
Lunges Training.description: Swing one leg forward and backward to warm up the hip flexors.

Lunges Training.name: Lateral Leg Swings
Lunges Training.description: Swing one leg side to side to warm up the hips and inner thighs.

Lunges Training.name: Arm Circles
Lunges Training.description: Rotate your arms forward and backward in controlled circular motions.

Lunges Training.name: Torso Twists
Lunges Training.description: Twist your upper body side to side to loosen the spine and core.

Lunges Training.name: Jump Rope Simulation
Lunges Training.description: Jump in place as if using a jump rope to elevate heart rate.

Lunges Training.name: Dynamic Lunges
Lunges Training.description: Perform lunges in a flowing motion to activate leg muscles.
